metadata.Title: CVE-2019-20043 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: In in wp-includes/rest-api/endpoints/class-wp-rest-posts-controller.php inWordPress 3.7 to 5.3.0, authenticated users who do not have the rights topublish a post are able to mark posts as sticky or unsticky via the RESTAPI. For example, the contributor role does not have such rights, but thisallowed them to bypass that. This has been patched in WordPress 5.3.1,along with all the previous WordPress versions from 3.7 to 5.3 via a minorrelease.

criterions.comment: wordpress: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
